mapper.select: SELECT a.MessageID , a.Version , a.FolderID , a.Subject , COUNT(b.LikeID) AS LikeCnt FROM covi_smart4j.board_message AS a LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_like AS b ON a.MessageID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(b.TargetID,'_',1) AND b.TargetServiceType = 'Board' WHERE a.DeleteDate IS NULL GROUP BY a.MessageID -- HAVING COUNT(b.LikeID) > 0 ORDER BY LikeCnt DESC, a.RegistDate LIMIT 1

SELECT a.MessageID , a.Version , a.FolderID , a.Subject , (COUNT(b.CommentID) + SUM(b.ReplyCount)) AS CommentCnt FROM covi_smart4j.board_message AS a LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_comment AS b ON a.MessageID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(b.TargetID,'_',1) AND b.TargetServiceType = 'Board' AND b.MemberOf = 0 WHERE a.DeleteDate IS NULL AND b.DeleteDate IS NULL GROUP BY a.MessageID -- HAVING COUNT(b.CommentID) > 0 ORDER BY CommentCnt DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.MessageID , a.Version , a.FolderID , a.Subject ,a.ReadCnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_like AS b WHERE b.TargetServiceType = 'Board' AND b.TargetID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.MessageID,'_',1) ) AS LikeCnt FROM covi_smart4j.board_message AS a WHERE a.DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY a.ReadCnt DESC, a.RegistDate DESC LIMIT 1
select Tag, COUNT(TAG) AS Cnt from board_message_tag GROUP BY Tag ORDER BY Cnt DESC LIMIT #{limitCnt}

SELECT SOF.MenuID , SOF.FolderID , BM.MessageID , BM.Version , BM.Subject , BM.CreatorCode , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, CreatorName) AS CreatorName , DATE_FORMAT(BM.RegistDate,'%Y.%m.%d') AS RegistDate FROM board_message AS BM INNER JOIN sys_object_folder AS SOF ON (BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID) WHERE 1=1 AND SOF.FolderID = #{folderID} AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND BM.MsgType NOT IN ('N', 'B') AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A') AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND (UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (UseSecurity = 'Y' AND CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= #{localCurrentDate} ) ORDER BY IF(BM.ParentID = 0, BM.MessageID, BM.Seq) desc, depth,step ASC

SELECT DomainID , DomainCode , DomainURL , DisplayName , MultiDisplayName , MemberOf , DomainPath , SortKey , SortPath , IsUse , ServiceUser , Description , RegistDate , ServiceStart , ServiceEnd , SubDomain , OrgSyncType , DomainRepName , DomainRepTel , DomainCorpTel , DomainImagePath , DomainZipcode , DomainAddress , Memo , DomainBannerPath , DomainBannerLink , ChargerName , ChargerTel , ChargerID , ChargerEmail , IsUseGoogleSchedule FROM sys_object_domain sod WHERE DomainID = #{DomainID}
